[[Category:Monsters]] {| style="background:#f5faff; border:1px solid #cedff2; width:auto; margin: 0px 5%; margin-bottom:1.25em; font-style:italic; text-align:left; color:#000; padding:1.5em 1em;" |- | | style="width: 100%;" | A deep elf well-versed in a variety of destructive magics. |} [[Category:Templates]] ==Useful Info== '''Deep elf conjurers''' are fragile [[list of deep elves|deep elf]] [[Conjurations]] specialists which blast you with dangerous and irritating attack spells. They often appear in packs with other deep elves in the [[Elven Halls]] and sometimes in [[the Vaults]], they are also featured in some [[bailey]]s. ==Spells== [[Category:Spellcaster]]
{| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:0; padding:0; width:28em;" ! colspan="3" style="font-size:larger;" | Spell set I |- ! align="left" | Slot1 | [[Bolt of Fire]] (3d17) | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot2 | [[Bolt of Cold]] (3d17) | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot3 | [[Lightning Bolt]] (3d16) | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot4 | [[Bolt of Draining]] (3d17) | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- |}
==Tips & Tricks== It's hard to prepare for everything they can hit you with. [[Fire resistance]], [[cold resistance]], [[life protection]]... It's a lot to muster. Alternatively, you can just [[silence]] them, rendering them nearly harmless, or kill them at range. Like most deep elves, they're very fragile; two to three zaps from a [[wand of cold]] or [[wand of fire]] can take out multiple if you line them up first. ==History== Deep elf conjurers were removed in [[0.18]]. Prior to [[0.13]] they had a second spell set, one which included such annoyances as [[Sticky Flame]]. They also had less HD. [[category:Elf]]
